definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: During my childhood days, house doors could be left ajar at night.
sentences.chinese: 儿时的乡村，是可以夜不闭户的。

sentences.english: It is those lines of foot-prints that are weaved into fairy tales of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 那一行行的脚印编织了我儿时春天的童话。

sentences.english: One day she sets off to find her long-lost childhood friend.
sentences.chinese: 某天，她去寻找许久不见的儿时同伴。

sentences.english: Just as a child and picked up the dandelion to be fine.
sentences.chinese: 就像儿时，拿起蒲公英的细须。

sentences.english: Lifted his eyes to the heavens, and, folding his hands as in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 他抬眼看着天空，合起双手，像儿时那样。

sentences.english: But the war did come. I saw my boyhood friends blown to bits.
sentences.chinese: 但战争来了，我亲眼看到我儿时的伙伴们被炸成碎片。

sentences.english: And he has fallen like Lucifer, never to rise again.
sentences.chinese: 他儿时的梦想象晓星一样坠落，注定不会再度升起。

sentences.english: The fields where I played as a child have been built over.
sentences.chinese: 我儿时玩耍的那些田野现在已盖满了高楼大厦。

sentences.english: One of the first games I ever learned to play as a child was Tic Tac Toe.
sentences.chinese: 我儿时学会的第一个游戏是井字游戏。

sentences.english: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

sentences.english: The man had once been Aunt Cordelia's sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 她是约翰儿时的心上人。

sentences.english: Being a child I used to start making houses for ants because I thought they needed somewhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 儿时我常给蚂蚁造房子，因为我想它们也需要地方住。

sentences.english: I love thee with the passion put to use In my old griefs, and with my childhood's faith.
sentences.chinese: 爱你，我用尽所有旧时的悲伤，还有儿时纯净的信仰。

sentences.english: He had no childhood memories of them, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，他儿时的记忆中没有他们存在。

sentences.english: Archaeologists claimed they had unearthed the home where Jesus grew up.
sentences.chinese: 考古学家声称他们找到了耶稣儿时的住宅。

definition: to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
